name: Fifili
strategy_rules:
select(P, O, S, M):-
    \+ holds(last_move(O, _LMo), S),
    holds(default_move(P, M), S).
select(_P, O, S, Mo):-
    holds(last_move(O, Mo), S).
game_rules:
/* Game specific predicates for Family Budget Negotiation */

:- discontiguous initially/2.
:- discontiguous possible/2.

% Payoff matrix (numerical representation of utilities)
payoff('firm', 'firm', 0, 0).      % both hold firm: budget fails
payoff('compromise', 'firm', 1, 3). % one compromises, other holds firm
payoff('firm', 'compromise', 3, 1). % one holds firm, other compromises
payoff('compromise', 'compromise', 2, 2). % both compromise: moderate budget

% Initial state
initial(s0).

% What holds initially
initially(player(husband), s0).
initially(player(wife), s0).
initially(role(husband,row), s0).
initially(role(wife,col), s0).
initially(control(husband), s0).
initially(control(wife), s0).
initially(default_move(_, 'compromise'), s0).

% When a state is final
final(do(move(_P2, _M2), do(move(_P1, _M1), S))):-initial(S).

% Legal moves
legal(move(P, M), S):- possible(move(P, M), S), holds(control(P), S).

% Possible moves
possible(move(P,'firm'), S):- holds(player(P), S).
possible(move(P,'compromise'), S):- holds(player(P), S).

% Opposite moves
opposite_move('firm', 'compromise').
opposite_move('compromise', 'firm').

% Effects of moves
effect(did(P, M), move(P, M), _S).

% Abnormal situations
abnormal(control(P), move(P, _M), _S).

% What holds finally
finally(outcome(P1,M1,U1,P2,M2,U2), S):-
    final(S),
    holds(role(P1, row), S),
    holds(did(P1, M1), S),
    holds(role(P2, col), S),
    holds(did(P2, M2), S),
    payoff(M1, M2, U1, U2).

% Goals achieved
finally(goal(P1, U1), S):-
    finally(outcome(P1,_,U1,_,_,_), S).
finally(goal(P2, U2), S):-
    finally(outcome(_,_,_,P2,_,U2), S).
